original_title: You Can Practically Taste It With Your Eyes
overview: "A precursor to the style and energy of my early 16mm films, which I tend to think of as a trilogy: comprised of ‘Petit Mal’, ‘Ciao Bella or Fuck me Dead’ [1978] and ‘Soothing the Bruise’ [1980]" (B.B)
title: You Can Practically Taste It With Your Eyes
